Title: Wanted: Ohuna Mass-Binding Totem
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the Ohuna Mass-Binding Totem for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

Expedition members have reported a particularly powerful Primalist in the Windsong Rise of the Ohn'ahran Plains, who appears to wield the rumored powers of this totem.
PortraitGiverText: A powerfull air primalist in the Ohn'ahran Plains wields the Ohuna Mass-Binding Totem.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
RewardText:
Not sure I see what all the fuss is about with this one. Feels like every other dirty hunk of rock I've held before.

Oh well, I'll ensure this is properly documented, researched, and archived for the expedition.
